mapper.select: select a.apply_no , a.post_no , a.apply_status , m.mem_nickname , m.mem_mbti , m.gender from tb_partner_apply a inner join tb_member m on m.mem_no = a.mem_no where post_no = #{pnBoardNo}
select count(*) from tb_partner where partner_status = 'Y'

select p.post_no , p.mem_no , p.partner_type , p.partner_original_img , p.partner_title , p.partner_content , p.partner_start_date , p.partner_end_date , s.area_category_title , m.gender , m.mem_nickname , m.mem_mbti , m.mem_img from tb_partner p inner join tb_member m on p.mem_no = m.mem_no inner join tb_spot_area_category s on p.area_category_no = s.area_category_no where partner_status = 'Y' order by post_no desc
mapper.update: update tb_partner set partner_views = partner_views + 1 where post_no = #{post_no} and partner_status = 'Y'
mapper.select: select p.post_no , p.mem_no , p.partner_type , p.partner_original_img , p.partner_date , p.partner_views , p.partner_title , p.partner_content , p.partner_start_date , p.partner_end_date , p.area_category_no , s.area_category_title , p.partner_number , m.gender , m.mem_nickname , m.mem_mbti , m.mem_img from tb_partner p inner join tb_member m on p.mem_no = m.mem_no inner join tb_spot_area_category s on p.area_category_no = s.area_category_no where post_no = #{post_no}
mapper.update: update tb_partner set PARTNER_STATUS = 'N' where POST_NO = #{ postNo}
mapper.insert: Insert into TB_REPLY ( REPLY_NO ,BOARD_NO ,MEM_NO ,REPLY_CONTENTS ,REPLY_DATE ,REPLY_DISTINCT ) values ( SEQ_REPLY_NO.NEXTVAL , #{boardNo} , #{memNo} , #{replyContents} , SYSDATE , 'P' )
mapper.select: select reply_no , board_no , mem_no , reply_contents , to_char(reply_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as "reply_date" , REPLY_DISTINCT , mem_nickname as "reply_writer" from tb_reply join tb_member using(mem_no) where reply_distinct = 'P' and board_no = #{postNo}
